name: ICCameraDeviceDelegate
desc: Methods for detecting cameras, getting metadata and thumbnails, handling access and capability changes, and performing other actions on connected cameras.

items.name: deviceDidBecomeReady
items.desc: Tells the client that the camera device is done enumerating its content and is ready to receive requests.

items.name: cameraDevice
items.desc: Tells the client when objects are added to the device.

items.name: cameraDevice
items.desc: Tells the client when an object is added to the device.

items.name: cameraDevice
items.desc: Tells the client when objects are removed from the device.

items.name: cameraDevice
items.desc: Tells the client when the camera completes a delete operation.

items.name: cameraDevice
items.desc: Tells the client when an object is removed from the device.

items.name: cameraDevice
items.desc: Tells the client when one or more objects are renamed on the device.

items.name: cameraDevice
items.desc: Tells the client when the camera is about to execute queued requests for the metadata of a specific item.

items.name: cameraDevice
items.desc: Tells the client when the metadata requested for an item on a camera is available.

items.name: cameraDevice
items.desc: Tells the client when the requested thumbnail is available.

items.name: cameraDevice
items.desc: Tells the client when the requested thumbnail is available.

items.name: cameraDevice
items.desc: Tells the client when the camera is about to execute queued requests for the thumbnail of a specific item.

items.name: cameraDeviceDidChangeCapability
items.desc: Tells the client when a capability of a camera changes.

items.name: cameraDeviceDidEnableAccessRestriction
items.desc: Tells the client when an Apple device has been locked, and media is unavailable until the restrictionÂ has been removed.

items.name: cameraDeviceDidRemoveAccessRestriction
items.desc: Tells the client when an Apple device has been unlocked, paired to the host, and media is available.

items.name: cameraDevice
items.desc: Tells the client about a PTP event.
